description.en: What happened in room 207?

After he’s killed by the righteous leader of his own guild, Woojin gets a chance to start over. This time he’s not interested in saving the world from monsters — he’s got his sights set on revenge! 

His high-level kills quickly garner him notoriety among the game plebs, while boosting his stats as he masterminds his way closer to the top. But there's something no one can figure out: whose side he’s playing for. 

Now that he knows how to play to win, Woojin will stop at nothing to destroy the hero!
description.ja:
ある日、世界はゲームのように変わってしまった。 世界各地に「ダンジョン」が現れそこから「モンスター」が溢れ、特別な力を持つ「プレイヤー」が登場した。 孤独に生きていたウジンはメシアギルドのマスター・セジュンに出会い、初めて仲間たちと希望を持てるようになった。 しかし、彼の本当の姿は英雄ではなかった… 裏切られ殺されたウジンが目覚めるとそこはそこは自分が「プレイヤー」として覚醒する前の過去だった。 復讐のため「暗黒世界の代理者」の力を得て次々とレベルアップしていくき… 新たなダークヒーローがここに誕生する！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%82%AC-%EB%8D%94-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C/2376)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66181)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kill_the_Hero/191)
description.ko:
어느 날, 세상이 게임처럼 변해버렸다.
도시 한복판에 '던전'과 '몬스터'가 출몰했고,
신들의 권능을 받은 '플레이어'들이 등장했다. 

 이세준. 세상을 구원할 메시아 길드의 수장.
"저와 함께 세상을 구합시다. 이 악몽에 종지부를 찍읍시다."
영웅의 등장에 온 세상이 열광했고,
나는 그의 동료가 되었다. 

 하지만……

 인류가 구세주로 떠받들던 그는 영웅이 아니라,
세상을 지배하고자 야욕을 품었던 간웅이었다.
“그동안 수고했다. 네가 아니었다면 여기까지 올 수 없었겠지.”
최후의 던전에서 나는 그 놈의 칼에 목숨을 잃었다.

 …라고 생각했다.

 죽음의 순간, 내 귓가에 들려온 알림음.
[게임을 시작합니다.]
나는 플레이어로 각성하기 전의 과거로 되돌아 왔다.

 그리고 이제는, 내가 놈을……

 '사냥' 할 차례다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%82%AC-%EB%8D%94-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C/2376)

description.ru:
Этот мир не был милосерден, и я отвечал ему столь же искренней ненавистью. Когда он стал Игрой, для меня не изменилось ничего. Однако встреча с Ли Сэ-Чжуном – героем, Воином, членом самой почитаемой из гильдий – дала мне дом, товарищей и смысл жизни. Смыслом этим стало – уничтожить эти чертовы подземелья и закончить Игру! Я умер от меча в спину. От меча того, кому верил, у врат последнего подземелья… Теперь я вернулся и знаю точно, кто станет добычей «охотничьего пса» Ким У-Джина, чего бы мне это ни стоило!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%82%AC-%EB%8D%94-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C/2376)

แต่แล้วเขาก็ได้ย้อนเวลากลับมามีชีวิตขึ้นอีกครั้ง ชีวิตครั้งนี้ เขาจะเอาคืนเจ้าฮีโร่นั่นให้ได้!

altTitles.en: The story about my office noona

description.en:
Ahn was a mature and attractive older woman I met through my company's task force. Wise and caring, that's how I became captivated with her… However, she was also a woman with a child.  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nianshangjiejiedeyouhuo/list?title_no=1562)

I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.

altTitles.vi: Bác Sĩ Trùng Sinh Về Murim

description.en:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jin’s life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! He’s reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%9E/458?tab=episode)
description.fr:
J'étais à l'étranger pour faire du bénévolat médical, lorsque la guerre civile a éclaté. J'ai été tué par un soldat rebelle, alors que je prenais une balle pour un patient. Mais quand je me suis finalement réveillé, j'étais devenu un enfant!  
  
Et devant moi se tenait une charrette détruite et un groupe de personnes bizarrement vêtues, qui étaient inconscientes!  
  
"C'est exactement comme un monde de Murim."  
  
Alors que je m'empresse de prodiguer les premiers soins pour tenter de sauver ne serait-ce qu'une personne, je réalise que ce monde est celui du [Roi Démon Suprême], un roman de Murim que j'ai pris plaisir à lire.  
  
Après avoir rencontré l'équipe de secours des "Trois Grands Docteurs", j'ai découvert qu'une des personnes que j'ai sauvées était le protagoniste de ce roman, le futur Roi Démon "Yeoharyun"!

"Hé, puisque je te suis redevable de m'avoir sauvé, appelle-moi "hyung"."

Pour lui avoir sauvé la vie, je suis devenu frère de sang du futur Roi Démon, et Baekrineuison, l'une des personnes les mieux informées, a reconnu mon potentiel et m'a pris comme disciple. C'est ainsi que je suis devenu le plus grand médecin de Gangho!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)

description.ja:
海外医療奉仕先で内戦に巻き込まれ、患者を庇い、反乱軍の銃に撃たれたはずが、目を覚ますと子供の姿になっていた！？ 目の前には壊れた馬車と不思議な服装を着て倒れている人々！ ”まるで武侠の世界のようだ” １人でも救おうと応急処置をしていたところ、ここが日頃からよく読んでいた武侠小説「至尊天魔」の中の世界だということに気づく。 そこで「天下三大医員」の白鱗医仙に出会うが…

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.ko:
[독점연재]

해외 의료 봉사를 갔다가 내전에 휘말렸다.
환자 대신 반군의 총을 맞고 간신히 눈을 떴는데
아니, 어린아이가 됐잖아?!?

눈앞에 있는 건 부서진 마차와 특이한 복식의 쓰러진 사람들!

"꼭 무림 세계 같네."

한 명이라도 살리기 위해 응급처치를 하던 중,
이곳이 즐겨 읽던 무협 소설,
[지존천마] 속 세상이라는 것을 알게 되고.

'천하삼대의원' 백린의선을 비롯한 구조대를 만나
내가 구한 이들 중 하나가 이 소설의 주인공,
미래의 천마 '여하륜'이라는 것을 깨닫게 되었다!

"야, 살려 준 은혜가 있으니 형이라 불러라."

목숨을 구해 준 은혜로 미래의 천마와는 의형제를 맺고,
재능을 눈여겨 본 백린의선과는 사제 지간을 맺어
강호제일신의가 되는 진천희의 일대기!

지금 시작합니다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.ru:
Поехал на медицинское волонтёрство, а попал на гражданскую войну. Хотел спасти пациента – получил пулю и умер. А после… стал ребенком?!
Разграбленные повозки, люди в необычных одеждах – всё это напоминает мир Мурим. Оказав первую помощь пострадавшим, после встретив спасательный отряд из «Лечебницы трёх поколений поднебесной» и самого Пэк Рин Ый Сона, я осознал, что нахожусь в мире романа про боевые искусства «Величайший небесный демон».
Один из тогда спасённых мною – главный герой книги, будущий небесный демон – Ё Ха Рюн. «Эй, за то, что спас, можешь звать меня старшим братом» – вот так мы с ним сдружились. А Пэк Рин Ый Сон, рассмотревший во мне талант, стал мне учителем.
Меня зовут Чин Чхон Хи, я - последняя надежда Канхо, и это моя история!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)

description.th:
จินชอนฮี' ถูกจับพลัดจับผลูไปเป็นแพทย์อาสาอยู่ในพื้นที่ที่เกิดสงครามกลางเมือง
วันหนึ่งคนไข้ของเขาถูกฝ่ายกบฎใช้ปืนจ่อหมายเอาชีวิต
ทำให้เขาต้องเอาตัวเข้าไปขวางจนถูกยิงในที่สุด

ขณะที่กำลังปลงกับชีวิตและกำลังจะหมดลมหายใจ
จินชอนฮีก็ลืมตามาพบว่าตนเองอยู่ในร่างเด็ก
เท่านั้นยังไม่พอเขายังสวมชุดโบราณด้วย!

ลืมตามาได้ไม่เท่าไหร่เขาก็ต้องใช้วิชาที่เรียนมารักษาผู้คนที่บาดเจ็บ
และหนึ่งในนั้นก็คือจอมยุทธ์จากสำนัก 'ม้าด่วนมังกรเมฆา'
แล้วต่อมา 'แพ็คลิน' หนึ่งในหมอสามสำนักแพทย์ใหญ่ในใต้หล้า
ก็ปรากฎตัวขึ้น!

เขาจึงได้รู้ว่าตัวเองนั้นหลุดมาอยู่ในนิยายธีมยุทธภพ
เรื่อง 'จอมมารสวรรค์' ที่เขาเคยอ่านในโลกที่จากมา

ในเมื่อยังไม่รู้วิธีที่จะออกจากโลกนี้เขาจึงต้องใช้วิชาแพทย์ที่เคยร่ำเรียน
และความได้เปรียบจากการเป็นแฟนคลับตัวยงของนิยาย
เอาชีวิตรอดในโลกยุทธภพแห่งนี้!

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!
The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe
What’s more painful than being married to a faithless and irresponsible husband? Being in love with your own brother-in-law, that's what!

altTitles.ja: タランタランタラン～鳴り響く音にのせて～

description.en:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---

- Alternative Official Raw - [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/64041447)

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

description.en:
The Tiger Lord of the East is now my father?!
When Ari opens her eyes, she finds herself reborn as a baby in the land of divine animals, abandoned in the middle of a forest. Luckily, the white tiger lord takes her in, but he plans to send her away once she is old enough. Can Ari find a way to stay at the palace for as long as possible?
description.id: Tempat pertama saya membuka mata setelah saya lahir adalah di hutan di mana tidak ada seorang pun di sana. Saya sedih ditinggalkan, tetapi seekor harimau putih besar menggigit saya. Seseorang melakukannya. Bahkan jika Anda digigit harimau, Anda akan hidup selama Anda bangun. Namun… … … "Ini anakku, apakah aku perlu penjelasan lebih lanjut?" Harimau yang berkata, "Aku akan melakukan yang terbaik seumur hidupku, aku akan melindungimu!" Seekor harimau yang akan melindungiku selama sisa hidupku (?) Seekor kucing, tidak, seekor lynx dan "Kamu sangat imut, kenapa kamu tidak datang ke tanah barat?" Anjing gila, tidak, bahkan serigala! Setelah digigit harimau, ketika saya sadar, ada sesuatu, tidak, agak aneh. #Fusion fantasi romansa oriental #Seperti itu hal pengasuhan anak atau tidak #Yeoju yang lembut dan acuh tak acuh

description.en:
A oneshot:  
In a peaceful kingdom with a much loved King. There is only one problem. Hopefully the King will make the right choice.

altTitles.fr: La vilaine vit encore une fois

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่สองของนางร้าย
ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.

前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

description.en: This is a Side story from the City of Darkness manhua following the lives of the red hair Xiao Ji and his boss Shi Er Shao.

She was destroying people... in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone". As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint...? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!
description.ja:
空想の世界で人を壊していた――。

学校では優等生、家では足が悪い母親に尽くす女子高生・黒石希歩。物静かで優しい印象を持たれる彼女は、「人を殴りたい」という衝動をずっと抱えて生きていた。内なる狂気が膨れ上がる中、希歩は巷で話題となっていた通り魔と遭遇する……。

description.en: Everyone in his Triad gang looked up to him. He was the boss's favorite pupil, but then in a single night, after he had won so many territorial fights for his gang, he lost everything! Why?

title.en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?

altTitles.ja: 私をセンターにすると誓いますか？

altTitles.en: Do You Swear to Center Me?

description.en:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.

A story about the "Japanese Dream" begins, as they work together as a team to reach stardom in the entertainment world!
description.pt-br:
"Se você realmente puder me tornar o centro do grupo... eu me casarei com você."

Mizuki Natsuno é a membra menos popular do grupo ídolo "Melty Strawberry". Koichi Okuda é a única pessoa no mundo que continua apoiando Mizuki. Duas pessoas que nunca deveriam estar conectadas acabam em um relacionamento cooperativo sob o mesmo teto, subindo da base da hierarquia para se tornarem os líderes do grupo.

Começa uma história sobre o “Sonho Japonês”, enquanto eles trabalham juntos como uma equipe para alcançar o estrelato no mundo do entretenimento!

altTitles.ja: いかさま海亀のスープ

description.en:
Mock Turtle Soup  
  
A colored single-volume manga, that consists of 8 separate stories, filled with avante-garde illustrations and poems.

There is a Gothic-style mansion in a distant, rarely-visited part of Japan. There, the world's greatest surgeon, Naomitsu Madaraki, once lived but he hasn't come home in ages.  
  
Instead, the professor's "daughter," Fran Madaraki, lives there with a large amount of her own ghoulish creations and her "younger sister" Veronica. She's a very unusual girl, what with the stitch patterns on her face and the giant bolts on either side of her head. Just as skilled at surgery as her father, and if you're willing to pay her price, she can do everything up to and including raising the dead. Fran believes that a life should be saved no matter the cost, and keep that in mind, since the results of her surgeries are rarely (if ever) pretty.  
  
  
Fran can make anyone into anything, raise the dead, switch heads and bodies, and give you those eyes that you've always wanted. But do you actually want them? Is it a good thing to raise the dead? Do the ends justify the means? And does Fran care?
description.pt-br: Fran pode transformar qualquer um em qualquer coisa, ressuscitar os mortos, trocar cabeças e corpos, e te dar aquele visual que você sempre quis. Mas você quer mesmo isso? É seguro acordar os mortos? Os fins justificam os meios? A Fran liga pra isso?

altTitles.ja: 戦姫サバイバルサガ〜異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊〜
戦姫サバイバルサガ-異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊-

altTitles.ja-ro: Senki Survival Saga ~Isekai no Unmei wo Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu~

altTitles.en: Warrior Princess Survival Saga: The Unsanctioned Intergender Relations on a Deserted Island, Battling for the Fate of Another World

description.en:
Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic...!?

A survival comedy featuring the most powerful and beautiful girls from another world and an older man washed ashore on an uninhabited island!

(Source: Kadokawa)
description.ja:
千年に一人と言われる魔法の才能を持つエルフ・アナスタシアは、異世界で三つ巴の戦争の最終決戦へと赴く。
仇敵である魔族との戦いの最中激しい光に身を包まれたアナスタシアが目を覚ますとそこは、無人島であった。
無人島を散策するアナスタシアの前に謎の人間が現れ、しかも魔法が使えなくなっており…！？
異世界から来た最強美少女たちと無人島に流れ着いたオッサンによるサバイバルコメディ！

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

title.en: A Divorced Crybaby Has Moved in Next Door

altTitles.ja: バツイチで泣き虫なおとなりさん

description.en: Ochiai-San is an ordinary woman who recently went through a divorce. Years of marital neglect have chipped away at her self-esteem, making her more reserved and depressed. However, there is one light at the end of her tunnel - her next door neighbor, Sawatari-kun. Can he help bring her back out of her shell?
description.tr: Yeni boşanmış, ağlak komşu Ochiai-san ve Sawatari-kun'un yaşadıkları olayları anlatan seri.
description.pt-br: Ochiai-san é uma mulher comum que recentemente se divorciou. Anos de abandono conjugal prejudicaram sua autoestima, tornando-a mais reservada e deprimida. No entanto, há uma luz no fim do túnel, seu vizinho, Sawatari-kun. Ele pode ajudar a trazê-la de volta para fora de sua concha?

title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**

altTitles.ja: 篠崎くんのメンテ事情

description.en:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
description.uk:
Шінодзакі – звичайнісінький офісний планктон, в якого, однак, останнім часом аж надто легко відвалюється голова. Та ще й раптом у його звичайне, за виключенням того прикрого непорозуміння, життя вривається молода жінка на ім'я Юуяке.

Вона стверджує, що її бабуся-чарівниця в минулому докорінно видозмінила тіло Шінодзакі – і тепер він набитий безліччю механізмів!

...Які, власне, потребують технічного обслуговування, яке Юуяке тепер, вочевидь, буде проводити на регулярній основі.

Якось так і починаються дещо безбарвні будні звичайнісінького офісного планктону, чаклунки та чудернацької чорної істоти на ім'я Ґрей!

description.en: Falling in love, sparkling, shining, and melting together…

altTitles.en: A Love Letter and a 13-Year-Old Actress

description.en: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...? She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.
description.ja: 芸能事務所で経理として働く一色文は、ある日営業へと部署異動を言い渡される。担当するまだ13歳の子役の少女、羽賀文乃は、妙に文のことを気に入ったようで…？

description.en: Senagaki Isaku will be a first year high school student starting in spring. Her grandfather is the third head of the Senagaki group, a yakuza organization, so she is feared by those around her. However, starting from spring, she hopes to make normal friends and normally fall in love. She is admitted into a high school further from her hometown, however, the overprotective young head of the Senagaki group, Utou Keiya, (26 years old) falsifies his age and enters the school with her through a backdoor admission…?! Keiya proclaims that love is too early for her although Isaku is perfectly ready. In truth, she has held an unrequited love for Keiya for quite some time.
description.pt-br: Senagaki Isaku, é uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio e neta do chefe da família Senagaki, um grupo de Yakuzas. Por isso, sempre teve medo de tudo ao seu redor, mas a partir de agora quer poder ter amigos e se apaixonar por pessoas normais. Para isso, Isaku-Chan decide ir estudar em uma escola longe de sua cidade, sem contar que o super protetor Utou Keiya (jovem de 26 anos, integrante do grupo gangster) não tem intenção de deixar nenhum menino se aproximar e vai atrás dela, entrando na mesma escola mentindo sobre sua idade. E assim a história de amor começa!

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].
**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.de: Himuro ist Büroangestellter und der Nachfahre einer Schneefrau. Wann immer seine Gefühle außer Kontrolle geraten, werden seine Kollegen seinen eisigen Kräften ausgesetzt. Jedoch besitzt er entgegen seiner frostigen Fähigkeiten eine sehr warmherzige und freundliche Persönlichkeit. Er liebt Katzen und Blumen, auch wenn er ihnen nicht zu nahe kommen kann. Diejenige, die seine Gefühle immer wieder aus der Bahn wirft und sein Herz zum Schmelzen bringt, ist seine stets gefasst wirkende und ein wenig exzentrische Kollegin Fuyutsuki. Obwohl alle Kollegen durch den stetigen Ausbruch seiner Kräfte von seinen Gefühlen für Fuyutsuki wissen, ist diese vollkommen ahnungslos. Dies hält Himuro jedoch nicht davon ab, zu versuchen, ihr Herz für sich zu gewinnen.
description.en:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)
description.fr:
Himuro est le descendant d'une yuki-onna, une femme des neiges. Par cette filiation, il plonge inconsciemment son entourage dans un environnement proche de l'Arctique lorsqu'il se concentre.

Pire encore, il passe pour un homme qu'il n'est pas : perçu comme insensible et au tempérament glacial, il est en réalité chaleureux, aime les chats et les fleurs.

Son état finit par attirer l'attention de sa collégue Fuyutsuki, dont il est secrètement amoureux. Himuro se montre alors déterminé à capturer le coeur de la jeune femme.
description.id: Romansa lembut yang lucu tentang dekendensi yuki-onna yang membekukan area sekitarnya setiap kali dia berbicara dengan rekan kerjanya yang imut.
description.it:
Il manga racconta la dolce storia d'amore tra due colleghi, la tranquilla e dolce Fuyutsuki-san e Himuro-kun, discendente di una donna delle nevi, che letteralmente ghiaccia ogni cosa attorno a lui.

---
Questa è la storia di Himuro, il discendente di una donna delle nevi, e della sua gentile seppur particolare collega Fuyutsuki... Anche se a prima vista possono sembrare due persone imperturbabili, entrambi sono in realtà molto impacciati quando si tratta di questioni di cuore; infatti l’amore che Himuro nutre nei confronti di Fuyutsuki imperversa nel suo animo come una bufera di neve, impedendogli di compiere il fatidico primo passo. Lei, d’altro canto, pare del tutto inconsapevole dei suoi stessi sentimenti...
description.ja: 現代を生きる雪女の末裔な氷室くんと、同僚のちょっとユニークで優しい冬月さん。一見、クールに見えつつも、二人は恋愛にすっごく不器用。冬月さんへの「好き」が心の内で吹雪のように吹き荒れる氷室くんはもう一歩を踏み出せず、一方の冬月さんは自分の感情に超が付くほど鈍感で!?　Twitter＆pixivで大人気!!　クールな二人のピュア過ぎラブコメディー♪　単行本だけの描き下ろしマンガ３編を収録☆
description.ko:
현대를 살아가는 설녀의 후예 히무로와 
약간 독특하면서도 상냥한 동료 후유츠키. 

언뜻 보면 쿨해보이는 두 사람이지만, 연애에 관해서는 놀랄 만큼 서투르다. 
후유츠키를 향한 ‘호감’이 마음속에서 눈보라처럼 몰아치자, 
히무로는 더 이상 한 걸음도 나아가지 못하고. 
후유츠키 역시도 자신의 감정에 둔감하기는 마찬가지였는데!? 

Twitter&pixiv에서 대인기!! 
쿨한 두 사람의 맑다 못해 투명한 러브 코미디♪ 

단행본만의 오리지널 에피소드 3편도 수록☆
description.pl: Poznajcie Himuro, żyjącego we współczesnej Japonii potomka yuki-onny, oraz jego nieco nietypową koleżankę z biurka obok, Fuyutsuki. Choć na pierwszy rzut oka oboje wydają się spokojni i opanowani, tak naprawdę w miłości nie do końca dobrze sobie radzą. Himuro, w którego sercu panuje miłosna zamieć, nie jest w stanie wykonać kolejnego kroku naprzód, zaś Fuyutsuki zdaje się nie zauważać jego starań…
description.ru: Милый пушистый роман о классной работнице и её, холодном как лёд, коллеге.
description.th:
ฮิมุโระคุง ชายหนุ่มผู้สืบเชื้อสายของสาวหิมะซึ่งใช้ชีวิตอยู่ในยุคปัจจุบัน 
และคุณฟุยุสึกิ เพื่อนร่วมงานสาวผู้อ่อนโยนและค่อนข้างไม่เหมือนใคร 
หากมองแค่ผิวเผิน หนุ่มสาวคู่นี้ก็ดูเป็นคนคูลๆ อยู่หรอก 
แต่พอเป็นเรื่องราวความรักแล้ว ทั้งสองกลับไม่เอาไหนซะเลย
ฮิมุโระคุงผู้ได้แต่เก็บความ "ชอบ" 
ที่มีต่อฟุยุสึกิไว้ในใจประหนึ่งพายุหิมะที่โหมกระหน่ำ 
โดยไม่กล้าก้าวออกไปเริ่มต้นสักที 
ส่วนฝ่ายคุณฟุยุสึกิเองก็ช่างความรู้สึกช้าไม่รู้ใจตัวเองเลย!?
description.tr: Sevimli iş arkadaşıyla her konuştuğunda çevreyi donduran ve Yuki-Onna'nın soyundan gelen adam hakkında sevimli, kabarık bir romantizm.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy. Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy.
description.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事漫画 ，当雪男遇上酷酷女同事，办公室将掀起一场恋爱暴风雪！
description.pt-br: Himuro-kun, descendente de uma Yuki-onna moderna, acabou de chegar em seu novo trabalho, e acaba criando tempestades de neve e bonecos de neve quando é tomado por suas emoções e perde o controle. Sua paixão secreta por Fuyutsuki-san, uma colega de trabalho única, mas gentil, cresce tão forte que congela às vezes aqueles ao seu redor. Por outro lado, Fuyutsuki-san, que muitas vezes é visto como legal pelos outros, também está muito interessada no misterioso Himuro-kun. O relacionamento deles muda gradualmente através do trabalho diário e dos eventos da empresa, e eles também começam a passar tempo juntos, mas ambos são desajeitados no amor e não conseguem se aproximar…

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.en: When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

description.en:
The city is a terrible place to live. Greedy corporations, crazy cyborgs and shootouts on every corner.
Armed gangs look at the rest of the inhabitants as their legitimate prey.
Alice is a young girl who accidentally finds herself in the center of a criminal showdown.
Now she can only dream of a quiet life, but it will soon become clear who is the real predator.

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

title.en: I Bought A Rude Elf Slave At The Market

altTitles.ja: 市場で買った奴隷エルフにオラつかれる

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichiba de katta dorei Erufu ni ora tsukareru

description.en:
A gray Earth, where humanity was transformed into deformed beings. The curtains open on an action series where the goal is to recover a lost world, with the help of a strange-looking gun!
 
An enormous solar flare caused the planet to lose all of its colors. Humans are deformed and declining in numbers. The key to reclaiming the old world lies within the power hidden in *color*, and one *girl*. Knowing that the few remnants of colors in the world yield a great power, Avidia, who is conducting research while protecting a girl named Chie, uses the colors to expand his own power, and throws himself in a battle against the Cult.

---
A cosmic disaster changed the Earth forever, stripping away every last drop of color from the world. Mankind also changed: the familiar human face is almost forgotten in a world now populated wholly by mutants. Against the backdrop of a moody urban landscape, a lone-wolf investigator named Avidia relies on both his wits and extraordinary gun to hunt down the world's last hidden scraps of color. He soon crosses paths with a very special girl -- one who just might hold the key to bringing back what the world has lost.
description.es:
Una Tierra gris, donde la humanidad se transformó en seres deformes. Se abren las cortinas de una serie de acción en la que el objetivo es recuperar un mundo perdido, con la ayuda de un arma de aspecto extraño.  
  
Una enorme erupción solar hizo que el planeta perdiera todos sus colores. Los humanos están deformados y disminuyendo en número. La clave para recuperar el viejo mundo está en el poder oculto en el 「color」, y en una「Chica」. Sabiendo que los pocos restos de colores en el mundo producen un gran poder, Avidia, que está llevando a cabo una investigación mientras protege a una chica llamada Chie, utiliza los colores para expandir su propio poder, y se lanza a una batalla contra el Culto.
description.fr: Suite à une éruption solaire d'une ampleur sans précédent, la Terre a perdu ses couleurs. L'humanité, victime de mutations génétiques, est sur le déclin. Malgré tout, il subsiste encore des fragments infimes de couleurs dans le monde, et ils pourraient bien être la clé qui rendra à la Terre sa splendeur d'antan, tout comme une mystérieuse jeune fille Avidya, qui étudie la prodigieuse énergie contenue dans les couleurs, va devoir mettre sa vie en jeu pour protéger la jeune Tchié de l'Église, un culte qui cherche à s'emparer de ce pouvoir pour étendre son influence.
description.ja:
『シドニアの騎士』『人形の国』弐瓶勉先生、絶賛!!
「心配になるぐらい人間が出てきませんが大好きです。」


灰色の地球、
異形化が進んだ人類ーー。
失われた世界を取り戻す
異形ガンアクション、開幕!!

極大太陽フレアの影響で色素を失った地球。
異形化し、衰退の一途をたどる人類。
かつての世界を取り戻す鍵は
「色」に秘められた力と一人の「少女」。

世界に僅かに残された「色」の残滓に
巨大な力が宿っていることを知り
研究を進めるアヴィディアは、
少女・智慧を守りながら
「色」の力を使い勢力を拡大する
「教団」との戦いに身を投じることとなる。
description.pt:
Uma Terra cinza, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. As cortinas abrem-se em uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de estranha aparência.  
  
Uma enorme erupção solar fez o planeta perder todas as suas cores. Humanos estão deformados e declinando em números. A chave para reaver o velho mundo reside no poder escondido na “cor”, e uma “garota”. Sabendo que os poucos resquícios de cores no mundo carregam um grande poder, Avidia, que está investigando enquanto protege uma garota de nome Chie, usa as cores para expandir seu próprio poder, e se atira em uma batalha contra O Culto.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KKreptilian)
description.uk:
Сіра земля, на якій людство перетворилося на понівечених істот. Мета полягає в тому, щоб відновити втрачений світ за допомогою химерної зброї!

Потужний сонячний спалах змусив планету втратити всі свої кольори. Тіла людей сильно деформувалися, і їхня чисельність поступово падає. Ключем до відновлення старого світу є сила, прихована у "кольорі" та "дівчині". Авідія, який вивчає факт знаходження величезної сили в залишках "кольору", принагідно використовуючи її задля захисту дівчини на ім'я Чіє та розширення своєї сили, зійшовся у запеклій битві проти "культу".
description.pt-br:
Uma Terra cinzenta, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. Abrem-se as cortinas de uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de aspeto estranho!
 
Uma enorme erupção solar fez com que o planeta perdesse todas as suas cores. Os humanos estão deformados e a diminuir em número. A chave para recuperar o velho mundo está no poder escondido na *cor* e numa *menina*. Sabendo que os poucos restos de cores no mundo geram um grande poder, Avidia, que está a fazer pesquisa enquanto protege uma rapariga chamada Chie, usa as cores para expandir o seu próprio poder e lança-se numa batalha contra o Culto.

---
Uma catástrofe cósmica mudou a Terra para sempre, retirando do mundo até à última gota de cor. A humanidade também mudou: o rosto humano familiar está quase esquecido num mundo agora totalmente povoado por mutantes. Tendo como pano de fundo uma paisagem urbana sombria, um investigador solitário chamado Avidia confia na sua inteligência e na sua extraordinária arma para caçar os últimos restos de cor escondidos no mundo. Ele logo se cruza com uma garota muito especial - uma que pode ser a chave para trazer de volta o que o mundo perdeu.

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.
